resources.string: Dandelions with their golden flowers in the early spring are symbols rebirth, growth and a display of abundant strength and resilience.
Their seeds with fluffy parachutes are often blown while a wish is being made. The mysterious journey of those little travelers is believed to symbolize hope and healing.
Use this Dandelion app to break down your everyday experience like the flowers\' seedlings scattering away. Let this simple habit be a means to sustainable growth and hope for better future.
